description.comment: The spotted scat (Scatophagus argus) is a two basic color morph fish (green or red), found from the Indo-Specific region to Australia. They are popular aquarium fish.This sample was collected by Byrappa Venkatesh, supported by Gene Myers, in collaboration with Richard Durbin, and used to generate a high-quality reference genome as part of the G10K-VGP and Fish VGP projects.
description.title: Animal sample from Scatophagus argus
